subject: Fashion
title: Louboutin's Red Sole Legal Battle
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Louboutin's Red Sole Legal Battle.

hook.text: Christian Louboutin painted a shoe sole red with nail polish and created an empire.

buildup.text: The red sole became fashion's most recognizable status signal from the ankle down.

discovery.text: Louboutin trademarked the red soleâ€”then had to defend it in court against YSL.

twist.text: The court ruled red soles are trademarkable only when contrasting the shoe color.

climax.text: A splash of nail polish became a legal precedent in fashion intellectual property.

punchline.text: One red sole. Billion-dollar brand. Landmark court case.

quiz.question: What was the court's ruling on Louboutin's red sole trademark?
options: It was invalid and anyone could use it
It's protected only when contrasting with the shoe's color
Only Louboutin can use red on any part of a shoe
